alert.note: Alert for Leake; Neshoba; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:46PM CDT until June 10 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Leake County in central Mississippi... Newton County in east central Mississippi... Southern Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 1246 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Tuscola to near Steele to Homewood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Conehatta and Madden around 100 PM CDT. Prospect, Lawrence, Roberts and Stratton around 110 PM CDT. Newton, Decatur and Dixon around 115 PM CDT. Neshoba and Garlandville around 120 PM CDT. Duffee, Little Rock and Bethsaida around 130 PM CDT. House around 135 PM CDT. Herbert Springs around 140 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Chunky and Hickory. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
